author: cms-tau-pog
body:
This PR is to update an MVA anti-e tau discriminant as preparation to introduction of discriminants with a new training with current data. The updated consists of
* values of a set of MVA input parameters are constrained against unphysical outliers (key change for the new MVA training),
* making `usePhiAtEcalEntranceExtrapolation` parameter an internal parameter of the MVA algorithm to which it belongs rather than of the producer which calls the algorithm,
* a few other fixes to the code, e.g. range-based loops, a modern pointer instead of bare C pointer, etc.

The changes are not expected to change result, i.e. returned value of the MVA anti-e tau discriminant (together with related WPs) with the current training, or the changes will be marginal, i.e. below precision of performed tests with ~100k of ZLL (L=e,mu,tau) events.

A PR with additional changes in configuration files to introduce the new training will be send when the training fully validated and related payloads loaded to CondDB.
title: Update anti-e tau discriminant
